title: Gilbert & Sullivan's the Sorcerer
brief_description: Performers include: Clive Revill, David Kernan, Alexander Oliver, Nan Christie, Donald Adams. The London Symphony Orchestra (London) conducted by Alexander Faris. John McCarthy (Chorus Master), Ambrosian Opera Chorus. Staged by Stephen Pimlott. Introduced by Douglas Fairbanks Jnr.
